column5: Quick report.  Went to see my parents, they were docked at Toronto Island Marina for the weekend. Of course we threw in the gear for the trip.  Got into some bass, just tossin at the docks, and of course the sweetie takes the biggest.  Some pike follows with no takers. Even if it is only for an hour, it's still worth it! Here's a quick pic. Jeff
Nice of her to let you hold her fish.
Yeah, she seems to have the catchin figured out, now we just gotta get the unhooking and holding down pat!
Damn i need to hit up the Islands!
She'll come around.  I remember when I was afraid to touch the leeches, now I can do it.  Very nice Largie.  Joey

Leeches are the easiest to put on a hook Joey...unlike worms and minnows that squirm or flip around, leeches just grab hold of your hand while you put the hook in them...take hardly any blood at all...   sorry...off topic...
